root: ^Howdy, I'm the deputy sheriff in these parts, you that bounty hunter I called in?

c-0: ^It's bout' darn time, I've been holed up in here for hours
^Why can't you come down here and handle things yourself?
c-1: ^Don't you pull an attitude with me partner, since sheriff died I'm the one in charge
^Then why don't you come down here and handle things yourself?
g-0: ^It's that devil Sallie Pitts! Sheriff n' I locked her up, but she darn got out last night and robbed that there bank n' shot my sheriff dead!
^I recken if I step out there I'm toast

c-2: ^Take a look 'round see what you can find

g-1: ^Looks like old man Jenkins is sittin' out by his Inn
